results.title: Simvastatin/hydrogel-loaded 3D-printed titanium alloy scaffolds suppress osteosarcoma via TF/NOX2-associated ferroptosis while repairing bone defects
results.text_hl: Therefore, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ is an ideal drug for treating @DISEASE_Osteosarcoma @DISEASE_MESH:D012516 @@@osteosarcoma@@@-related @<m>DISEASE_Bone_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001847 @@@bone defects@@@.

results.title: Bone-Targeting Nanoparticles of a Dendritic (Aspartic acid)3-Functionalized PEG-PLGA Biopolymer Encapsulating Simvastatin for the Treatment of Osteoporosis in Rat Models
results.text_hl: In vivo experiments comparing low-dose @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ treatment (0.25 mg/kg per time, 2 times per week) showed that bone-targeting @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@/APP NPs could increase the bone formation effect compared with non-bone-targeting @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@/PP NPs in a local @<m>DISEASE_Bone_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001847 @@@bone loss@@@ of hindlimb suspension (disuse) model, but did not demonstrate good bone formation in a postmenopausal (ovariectomized) model of systemic @<m>DISEASE_Bone_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001847 @@@bone loss@@@.

results.title: Local drug delivery in the treatment of furcation defects in periodontitis: a systematic review
results.text_hl: Significant improvement was reported in radiographic @<m>DISEASE_Bone_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001847 @@@bone defect@@@ depth and defect depth reduction when SRP was supplemented with @CHEMICAL_Alendronate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019386 @@@alendronate@@@, @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_boric_acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:C032688 @@@boric acid@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.
